extendedInfo.description: Pick-up Pencils is a simple, fun mental skill game. It's also a good time killing game. In the game, you need to look carefully to tap the topmost pencil until the last one. The less time you use the better. To begin the game, a bundle of pencils are somewhat randomly distributed, maybe pens, water color brush, rulers, scissors and so on. Pick-up Pencils is over when the last stick is removed. Notice: If you pick the wrong pencil, more will be added. Download Pick-up Pencils and challenge. Share your scores with your friends and see whose time is the shortest and scores is the highest. Pick-up Pencils won't let you down.âââââFeature ââââââ Easy controls! â Simple, Little Fun mental skill Gamesâ Without  Network Connection!â Complete utilization of your iPhone, iTouch and iPad features! â View Fastest Time in Game center. â Adequate Time-wasting Game! â Constant updates!! â Super Fast Loading!Like play simple fun games? Pick-up Pencils is the perfect game for you. Are you ready? Get your hand ready for the new pencils picking game. Download Right Now and Challenge anytime and anywhere. Have Fun!! ^ _ ^

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This game is terrible the objects are so thin if you dont touch it just right then it adds more pencils,this game is terrible
